LanguageData.RK_FakeEar.label: fake Ratkin ear
LanguageData.RK_FakeEar.description: A fake Ratkin ear sewn from cloth.\n\nA Ratkin's large, rounded ears are inextricably tied to their personal honor and dignity, as their presence (or absence) greatly affects their standing in Ratkin society. Those who have lost their natural ears through injury or disease wear fake Ratkin ears to hide their humiliating disfigurement.
LanguageData.RK_FakeTail.label: fake Ratkin tail
LanguageData.RK_FakeTail.description: A fake Ratkin tail made from cloth twisted into rope.\n\nLike ordinary non-humanoid mice, Ratkins use their tails for balance while moving. Those who have lost their natural tails through injury and disease wear fake Ratkin tails, and while the non-living rope tail does not fully restore their loss of balancing ability, it is still better than nothing.
LanguageData.RK_BionicTail.label: bionic Ratkin tail
LanguageData.RK_BionicTail.description: An advanced prosthetic Ratkin tail containing an array of accelerometers, actuators and a small, primitive AI.\n\nLike ordinary non-humanoid mice, Ratkins use their tails for balance while moving. Those who have lost their natural tails through injury and disease can opt to wear this bionic tail, which fully restores their loss of balancing ability.
